mosa.pages.home.my-services[0].label: UI / UX Design
mosa.pages.home.my-services[0].text[0].v: As a UX/UI designer, I specialize in crafting modern and creative designs that captivate users.With tools like Adobe XD and Figma, I bring ideas to life with a touch of innovation.
mosa.pages.home.my-services[0].text[1].v: My designs aren't just visually appealing; they're intuitive and user-friendly.
mosa.pages.home.my-services[1].label: Web-Development
mosa.pages.home.my-services[1].text[0].v: In web development, I translate my designs into interactive websites using the latest Angular framework. With expertise in Angular Material, I ensure that the user experience remains consistent and delightful across various platforms and browsers.
mosa.pages.home.my-services[1].text[1].v: Every website I create is not only visually stunning but also responsive, adapting flawlessly to different devices and screen sizes.
mosa.pages.home.my-services[2].label: App-Development
mosa.pages.home.my-services[2].text[0].v: As an app developer, I specialize in crafting performant applications that deliver seamless experiences. I use tools like Ionic and native Ionic Android plugins to ensure that every app I create meets the highest standards of functionality and efficiency.
mosa.pages.home.my-services[2].text[1].v: Whether it's optimizing performance or implementing cutting-edge features, I'm dedicated to bringing my app ideas to life with finesse.
mosa.pages.home.rating[0].label: Like
mosa.pages.home.rating[1].label: What you see?
mosa.pages.home.rating.label: {{ rating }} out of {{ total }}
mosa.pages.home.biography[0].text: Hey there, I'm Samuel, a 23-year-old Web Designer and Frontend Developer based in Osnabrück, Germany. With over 3.5 years of experience, I bring a wealth of knowledge in frameworks like Angular and Ionic, while also utilizing my skills in design tools such as Figma and Adobe XD. This enables me not only to design but also to create powerful websites and apps.
mosa.pages.home.biography[1].text: My journey began in 2016 when I enrolled in a tech-related school for a year, where I gained fundamental knowledge in Computer Science. In 2017, I commenced my apprenticeship, applying the foundational knowledge acquired at school to real-world projects for clients. Upon completing my apprenticeship, I transitioned to a new company to specialize in frontend development and design.
